Text: RE Member Applications Cc and ok by me others i have too litle information to add value regards jm Original Message From Mary Cunningham SMTP Sent Thursday September PM To ISDA BOARD Richard Grove Cc Robert Pickel Ruth Ainslie Nick Collier Camille Irens Yasuko Horibe Shigeki Kawano Subject Member Applications The following institutions will go for approval at the next ISDA Board meeting on September Associate Broker Treasury Connect an internetbased communication and transaction platform designed for the execution of currency and interest rate swaps Cantor Fitzgerald International Associate Allen Gledhill Singaporean law firm Mori Sogo Law Offices Japanese law firm OMelveny Myers LLP US law firm TriOptima Software Provider Derk Brouwers company Subscriber Bayview Financial Trading Group LP a finance company InterAmerican Development Bank Accord Energy Limited a subsidiary of Centrica plc Accord is a provider of gas and electricity to consumers and a range of other services related to the home work and motoring We are checking at this time to see whether Accord Energy should be applying at the Primary level

RE Membership applications Cc on the name sorry Jos M Hernndez Original Message From Mary Cunningham SMTP Sent Friday December PM To ISDA BOARD Richard Grove Cc Emmanuelle Sebton Richard Metcalfe Ruth Ainslie Shigeki Kawano Yasuko Horibe Angela PapeschSing Camille Irens Subject Membership applications The following three applications will go for approval at the Dec executive committee meeting Please let me know if you are familiar with Powder Horn Petroleum Company Thanks Mary Associate Derivatives Documentation Limited DDL derivatives documentation consultancy and project management company Reech Capital PLC provides consulting pricing advisory executive search and training Subscriber Powder Horn Petroleum Company

RE Capital One Banksorry Original Message From Mary Cunningham SMTP Sent Friday March PM To ISDA BOARD Robert Pickel Subject Capital One Bank Does anyone know Capital One Bank Europe PLC They have applied for NonDealer Financial Subscriber membership The contact given is Jim Stevens Treasury Analyst located at Hanover Square London He says the bank is an enduser Identifies Capital One Bank as a credit card issuer offering other limited retail banking services Thanks Mary

RE Capital One Banksorry Original Message From Mary Cunningham SMTP Sent Friday March PM To ISDA BOARD Robert Pickel Subject Capital One Bank Does anyone know Capital One Bank Europe PLC They have applied for NonDealer Financial Subscriber membership The contact given is Jim Stevens Treasury Analyst located at Hanover Square London He says the bank is an enduser Identifies Capital One Bank as a credit card issuer offering other limited retail banking services Thanks Mary
